page.title: 02A Typical Day.
page.content: Monday 22nd April. Today I got up at 6.30a.m. and my mother got up at 7.30a.m.I went up to dress.I washed my face and hands then I cleaned my teeth.I had some toast.At 8.40a.m.I went to call my friend.We got to school at 9.00am.We waited for Sir and we went over the hall for assembly.We sat down and we sang a song. One of the teachers told us a story and he asked us questions.We said a prayer and we left the hall to go back to class. We did an essay and then we did some maths.Now it was dinner time.After play we went back to class.The police came to explain the Green Cross Code.They showed us how to cross the road.Then it was home time.When I got home I dressed and went to Cubs.I came back home and went to bed at 9.45pm.
